changeInfo: [JIRA:ARK-907] Remove padding from inputs with feedback.
[JIRA:ARK-1710] CSS refactoring.
[JIRA:ARK-1721] Vertical scroll is forced in modal overlay.
[JIRA:ARK-1640] Fix display icons on the right side of navbar on large screens.
[JIRA:ARK-1709] Cleanup and refactoring the styling to be used outside of search use cases.
(BREAKING CHANGE) Remove agent-status-* icons as there are already new and updated status-* icons.
(BREAKING CHANGE) Remove icon 8-dropdown-arrow-small, existing dropdown-arrow can be used.
Update menu-hamburger icon.
Update status-queue icons.
Fix status-ready-partial icon.
Add 2 new icons: status-queue-full and status-unknown.
Add 4 new icons: measure-growing, measure-point-in-time, measure-sliding, measure-today.
[JIRA:ARK-1690] Style <select> element to have consistent design and arrow across browsers.
[JIRA:ARK-1695] Add padding to buttons when there is more than 2.
[JIRA:ARK-1640] Add responsive support.
Update documentation.
[JIRA:ARK-1696] Update typography sizing to match UX Guidelines (minor adjustment to H4).
[JIRA:ARK-1698] Styling adjustments to match UX Guidelines.
Upgrade Gallery to Angular 1.5.
[JIRA:ARK-341][JIRA:ARK-1699][JIRA:ARK-1700] Improvements in Color section.
Many fixes and improvements.
[JIRA:ARK-1668] Published package shows incorrect version.
(BREAKING CHANGE) Remove icon-exapand-right because of typo, icon-expand-right already in place.

(BREAKING CHANGE) Replace social icons with new ones (icon-social-google-plus -> icon-google-plus-circle, icon-social-linked-in -> icon-linkedin-square, icon-social-pinterest -> icon-pinterest-circle).
(BREAKING CHANGE) Remove icon-status-call icon as it has been superseded by more specific Agent Status icons.
(BREAKING CHANGE) Rename and update icon-status-blocked icon to icon-status-ready-blocked.
New CX icons.
New and updated Agent Status icons.
New icons (icon-archive, icon-calendar-media-voice, icon-drag-out).
Update icons icon-clock-timezone, icon-pinned and icon-tag.
[JIRA:ARK-1654] Add Dark Background support.
[JIRA:ARK-1209] Fixed wrongly aligned triangle for hover dropdown.
[JIRA:ARK-1616] Sorting icons are inconsistent with Ark Grid.
Remove old unused Jekyll Dev Gallery.
Minor cleanup.
Simplify content organization.
Minor fixes on few pages.
Fix height on buttons with icons.
[JIRA:ARK-930]: Internal Information found in compiled CSS and remove MIT license.
Delete all JS jQuery based component code that Ark does not support.
Clean up and refactor of build (Grunt) process.
Move jQuery as a devDependency, so Ark Style no longer requires jQuery.
[JIRA:ARK-1194] Correct Genesys blue to match UX Guidelines (#75A8FF)
New Dev Gallery based on Angular.
Remove JS section (Bootstrap-based) as no longer supported.
[JIRA:ARK-1074]: Accordion header paddings should follow Summary Palette Design Guidelines.
[JIRA:ARK-1190]: Style fixes for the basic states of the generic and primary buttons.
[JIRA:ARK-1051]: Change dropdown arrow to grey on buttons.
[JIRA:ARK-1483]: New Icons (GWE, Social Media, Charts).
Update login form example to use `autocomplete=off`.
[JIRA:ARK-1194]: Styling improvements (correct padding and borders and add styling for action button)
[JIRA:ARK-1193]: Popover style fixes (padding, shadow position, and corner radius).
[JIRA:ARK-910]: Add Multi Sate Checkboxes.
[JIRA:ARK-724]: New Inspect Email icon.
[JIRA:ARK-694]: Update jQuery dependency to point to Nexus.
[JIRA:ARK-671]: Table Nav Icon: Removed right spacing that became unnecessary when table elements introduced padding.
[JIRA:ARK-686]: Implemented CSS regression testing.
[JIRA:ARK-709]: Adding styling for icons in title header.
[JIRA:ARK-398][JIRA:ARK-399]: Accordion: Set accordion-header cursor to pointer, added left padding.
[JIRA:ARK-691]: Error in dropdown CSS not applying styles properly.
[JIRA:ARK-326]: Forms: Promoted "Checkboxes and radios" to its own section.
[JIRA:ARK-333][JIRA:ARK-334][JIRA:ARK-342]: Underline Tabs: Changed example icon, added example, set default active in examples.
[JIRA:ARK-358]: Ark Login: Changed login alert icon to a supported colour, added padding-top to error-container.
[JIRA:ARK-618]: 3 Agents Status + Tag icons need fixing.
[JIRA:ARK-332]: Gallery adjustments.
[JIRA:ARK-336]: Gallery adjustments.
[JIRA:ARK-337]: Gallery adjustments.
[JIRA:ARK-338]: Gallery adjustments.
[JIRA:ARK-289]: Styling moved from Ark Component into Ark Style.
[JIRA:ARK-217]: Buttons with icons now have the same height as regular buttons.
[JIRA:ARK-226]: Table cells don't have a right padding.
[JIRA:ARK-402]: Misaligned header icon fix.
New optional theme added.
Adding support for menu item hover on Navbar.
New icon format temporarily disabled.
[JIRA:ARK-290]: Font icon generation process improved.
[JIRA:ARK-204]: Button gradients are reversed in Firefox.
[JIRA:ARK-157]: Added search input to Ark Forms.
[JIRA:ARK-294]: Support for this ticket. Icon rotates if dropdown opens up.
New icons added.
New icons added.
[JIRA:ARK-217]: Configured grunt web-font to generate CSS to fix fonticon positioning issues.
Updated documentation with correct files.
Updated the color of the Ark Side Tabs borders.
Added Primary and Secondary Header styling.
Prefixed ark-css main class name renamed to `ark` (from `ark-css`).
Font Icons regenarated because of problems rendering icons in Windows.
Prefixed ark-css for usage in mixed environment (such as with GAX or other libraries) to avoid collisions.
[JIRA:ARK-195]: Fixed padding for dropdown arrow.

New Icons Added (icon-24-control-pause, icon-24-graph-grid-cell, icon-agent-like, icon-chat-frown, icon-chat-smile, icon-checkbox-tick-lock, icon-cobrowse-disable, icon-dashtab-dash, icon-dashtab-settings, icon-dashtab-xwidget, icon-dialpod, icon-exapand-right, icon-globe, icon-inspect-phone, icon-inspect-phone-disable, icon-inspect-star, icon-pc-mobile-phone, icon-status-bad, icon-status-good, icon-view-lists), related to [JIRA:UX-590]
[JIRA:ARK-175]: Removed 'within pills' from gallery.
[JIRA:ARK-176]: Removed 'collapse' from gallery.
[JIRA:ARK-177]: Fixed vertical positioning of fonticons.
[JIRA:ARK-178]: Changed caret icon to chevron icons.
[JIRA:ARK-184]: Fixed resizing navbar issue styling.
